title: Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers 

(Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister agriculture food marine) order 2020

title: Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as
heading: 2. Patrick Donohoe, particulars of whose address have been deposited at
text_raw:
2. Patrick Donohoe, particulars of whose address have been deposited at 
the offices of the Department of Agriculture, Food and the Marine, is appointed 
to be a Special Adviser to the Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine 
with effect from 9 November 2020.
text_norm: 2 patrick donohoe particular whose address deposited office department agriculture food marine appointed special adviser minister agriculture food marine effect 9 november 2020

title: Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as
heading: 3. Darran Brennan, particulars of whose address have been deposited at
text_raw:
3. Darran Brennan, particulars of whose address have been deposited at 
the offices of the Department of Agriculture, Food and the Marine, is appointed 
to be a Special Adviser to the Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine 
with effect from 1 December 2020. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

22 December, 2020. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 5th January, 2021.
